My Creative Process

All of my Web and Design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Discussing the project with the whole team is the first and the most important task in developing the best solution for the client.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Searching and concepting each and every process through which the project can be completed and selecting the most efficient one.

3

UI/UX Planning

UI/UX are the basic building blocks of any website and before starting a new website from scratch, it is important to visualize the whole project by UI/UX Planning.

4

Interaction

Taking reviews from peers and the users is the last and also an essential task.
